channel.title: 718 run.bat help please
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello, I have a mate bugging me to check out the rune-evo v3, but for some reason I seem to run in to a noob error lol
Been trying to get this but driving me mad.
The run.bat: [CODE]@title Run Server @echo off java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -server -cp bin; lib/log4j-1.2.16.jar;lib/mysql-connector-java-5.1.18-bin.jar;lib/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;lib/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher pause[/CODE]
The error: [CODE]Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_65\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
First time I got this error lol Feeling very nooby :P
Any and all help will be very much appreciated. Thanks.[/CENTER]

item.title: 718 run.bat help please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I assume this would be your fix:

stackoverflow.com

Missing `server' JVM (Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll.)

java, dll, jvm
asked by Raj on 10:02AM - 08 Aug 13

But obviously with your version of java

item.title: 718 run.bat help please
item.dc:creator: @loliateyourcat loliateyourcat
item.description:
@loliateyourcat wrote:

[CENTER]Hello, I have a mate bugging me to check out the rune-evo v3, but for some reason I seem to run in to a noob error lol

Been trying to get this but driving me mad.

The run.bat:

@title Run Server @echo off java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -server -cp bin; lib/log4j-1.2.16.jar;lib/mysql-connector-java-5.1.18-bin.jar;lib/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;lib/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher pause

The error:

Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_65\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .

First time I got this error lol Feeling very nooby

Any and all help will be very much appreciated. Thanks.[/CENTER]

Read full topic
